question: A painter works for 5 weeks every month and for 6 days every week. If he gets paid £40 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The painter works for 6 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 6 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<6*5=30>>30 days/month
If he earns £40 every day he then earns £40/day * 30 days/month = £<<40*30=1200>>1200/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns £1200/month * 12 months/year = £<<1200*12=14,400>>14,400
#### 14,400
